entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
